note.p: Career: Assistant, Kew Observatory; Assistant to the Director, and Chief Superintendent and electrician to the Indo-Europeanan Telegraph Department, Persian Gulf (1863); Superintendent, Government Observatory, Bombay (1868-1886); Director of the Colaba Observatory, Bombay
Notes: Index to BR gives death date as March 1896.
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
